code: import{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const products=[{id:1,name:"Laptop",price:600},{id:2,name:"Headphones",price:80},{id:3,name:"Keyboard",price:40},{id:4,name:"Mouse",price:25}];function Shop(){const[cart,setCart]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();const addToCart=product=>{setCart([...cart,product]);};const total=cart.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+item.price,0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDECD\uFE0F Shop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"products",children:products.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:p.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u20B9 ",p.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(p),children:"Add to Cart"})]},p.id))}),cart.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\uD83D\uDED2 Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Total: \u20B9 ",total]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/order",{state:{cart}}),children:"Checkout"})]})]});}export default Shop;
